Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Eliminates the maximum age for taking the civil service examination for appointment as a police officer or as an environmental conservation officer
Summary: Eliminates the maximum age for taking the civil service examination for appointment as a police officer or as an environmental conservation officer.
LawCode: Amd ยง58, Civ Serv L; amd ยง215, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law and the executive law, in relation to eliminating the maximum age limitation for appointment as a police officer or as an environmental conservation officer
